blueprint.description:
This REQUIRES the Ghost Scanner mod:
https://mods.factorio.com/mod/GhostScanner
and it MUST be configured with "Scan Result Liimit" of zero (0).

Since those scans are expensive and can cause jank, consider increasing the "Update Frequency" to 600 or even 3600.

The lamp beside the ON Switch indicates what it's doing:
cyan = waiting for material
yellow = building
blue = recycling
green = done
red = turned off
blueprint.label: Construction Site
